page.title: 12SPORTS CLUBS IN WILMSLOW
page.content: {Golf Clubs}_ Wilmslow 18 holes,300 members. Alderley, 9 holes. 600 members. {Cricket Club}_ Land in trust to people of Lindow_ administered by trustees.Area 1 hectare. 50 members paying Â£3_Â£8 subscription each year. {Football Club}_ 50 members pay Â£5 joining fee and from Â£3_Â£8 annual subscription. 40 members, only 17 training. The club is run by a committee. The ground is 1 hectare in area. {Tennis Club}_ Has 5 courts and 150 members. Adult membership Â£21.00 per year. Child membership Â£15.00. 100 people play a week. Visitors are welcome if they come with a member. {Darts and card games}_ These games are played in all Public Houses in our area.
